document.full_text: bill nguyen, the serial entrepreneur who sold his last company to apple inc in 2009, is launching a new cellphone-based social network which aims to challenge facebook's dominance in social communications beyond the personal computer.
document.title: ex-apple exec rolls out phone-based social network
lines_and_colors: bill nguyen, the serial entrepreneur who sold his last company to apple inc in 2009, is launching a new cellphone-based social network which aims to challenge facebook's dominance in social communications beyond the personal computer.
